data.message: Hello friends beautiful wonderful amazing friends... I need a favor. I need character statements about me and or my parenting from friends, family, coworkers, and aquaintances. If you can help me out please let me know. My email is TabathaSanayaRoss@gmail.com... court is on Thursday. It may get pushed out but if you can help me with a letter please do so asap and be sure to put your name address and phone number at the bottom and include how we know eachother and how long we have known eachother.
